Text: Magda Sawon is a contemporary art gallerist and art world figure who founded and owns New York's Postmasters Gallery (with her husband Tamas Banovich), a gallery for young and established contemporary artists, especially those working in new media, in the Tribeca neighborhood of New York City.
Triplets:<Magda Sawon

<Text: Magda Sawon:  The gallery is considered to be one of the "leading experimental galleries" in New York City.>
